title: Why when i use the command: /fullmute all it doesnt mute the players emotes?

replies.body: Chat commands can be a little confusing, especially right now with the addition of emotes.  We've updated our[ chat command article ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752704)to help with new commands and mute features.  Hope it helps!
